resources.string:
aMetro v.%s

This is a program of cities underground and Metro.
Displays the metro schemes, allows you to find the shortest path between stations, and also describes what is next to the stations.
Maps are compatible with the project from pMetro. ©2010

Developers: Golovanov Roman, Vinichenko Vlad
Testers: Kuzmin Alexander, Nikitin Alexey
Design: Dusty Rat

Thanks to Boris Muradov (pMetro’s author, www.pmetro.su) for providing info and materials.

Developers’s site: http://sites.google.com/site/ametroproject

Your questions and suggestions send to ametroproject@gmail.com
